plugins.photosPermission: Allow showbizzz to access your photos to let you choose photos to upload to the system
Allow showbizzz to access your photos to let you choose photos to upload to the system
plugins.savePhotosPermission: Allow showbizzz to save photos that will be showed in your'e profile

infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: showbizzz requires access to your camera to let you add pictures to upload to your profile gallery and to change your profile picture
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: showbizzz requires access to the photo library to upload your profile photo
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: showbizzz needs to access your camera roll so that you can upload images
